text: Ruguo nimen zai luxing zhong (jiedai), erqie meiyou daishu de ren, namo, ke jiao chu diya pin; ruguo nimen zhong you yiren xintuo ling yiren, namo, shou xintuo de ren, dang jiao chu tasuo shou de xintuo wu, dang jingwei zhenzhu ─ ─ta de zhu. Nimen buyao yinhui jianzheng, shui yinhui jianzheng, shui de xin que shi youzui de. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de.
